Question: E-Like Industrial (Hong Kong) Limited CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
E-Like Industrial (Hong Kong) Limited

Product Highlight:

- E-Like Industrial (Hong Kong) Limited is part of the Hong Kong delegation at CES 2024, showcasing innovative products and technologies.
- The company participates in Design & Source and Eureka Park, presenting a diverse range of offerings including health monitoring wearables, smart living products, high-tech home appliances, car audio electronics, transmitter batteries, and smart speakers for the hearing impaired.

Specifications:

- Nano and Advanced Materials Institute (NAMI) showcased the "Wrinkleless TriClarity nScreen," a wrinkle-free, flexible, and high-contrast display for collapsible, large-size, and portable display/TV.
- AI Guided Ltd. presented "GUIDi," an AI smart belt empowering the visually impaired with MEMS and AI technology for a highly intelligent navigation system.
- Sitan Semiconductor International Co. Ltd. introduced the "0.13'' Micro LED Display Module," featuring ultra-high pixel density suitable for display units of AR/XR products.

Source:
https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/hktdc-led-hong-kong-delegation-makes-a-resounding-comeback-at-ces-2024-302026246.html
Summary_cn:
E-Like Industrial (Hong Kong) Limited

产品亮点：

- E-Like Industrial（香港）有限公司是2024年CES展会上香港代表团的一部分，展示创新产品和技术。
- 公司参与Design & Source和Eureka Park，展示多样化的产品，包括健康监测可穿戴设备、智能生活产品、高科技家电、车载音频电子产品、发射器电池和适用于听障人士的智能音箱。

规格：

- 纳米及先进材料研究所（NAMI）展示了“无皱TriClarity nScreen”，一种无皱、柔性和高对比度的可折叠、大尺寸和便携式显示屏/电视。
- AI Guided Ltd.推出了“GUIDi”智能腰带，利用MEMS和人工智能技术为视障人士提供高度智能的导航系统。
- 深天半导体国际有限公司推出了“0.13''微LED显示模块”，具有超高像素密度，适用于增强现实/虚拟现实产品的显示单元。

来源：
https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/hktdc-led-hong-kong-delegation-makes-a-resounding-comeback-at-ces-2024-302026246.html
